StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProcessingStatuses]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT PROC_STATUS_ID = CASE WHEN PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE = 'P' THEN 1 WHEN PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE = 'M' THEN 2 WHEN PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE = 'S' THEN 3 WHEN PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE = 'N' THEN 4 END, PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE, PROCESSING_STATUS_DESCRIPTION FROM PROCESSING_STATUS WHERE PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE <> 'L' ORDER BY PROC_STATUS_ID
